snippet: Dr. Miller was a psychologist and professor who helped create the cognitive psychology movement.
abstract: George A Miller, pioneer in the field of cognitive psychology, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Miller was a psychologist and professor who helped create the cognitive psychology movement.
